reviews.text: After flying into Milan from LA with two kids (6 & 3) the Regina Olga was a great way to start the trip. Only a 45-minute drive from Malpensa, this hotel is perfectly situated overlooking a small piazza and the lake.
reviews.title: Perfect 1st Stop WIth Kids

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: High ceiling adjoining rooms were authentically European and the kids loved watching the ferry boats zip back & forth to the dock close by.
reviews.title: Very pleasant place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cernobbio is a quiet little town, which was perfect since we found Bellagio touristy to stay there and Como way too industrial. The hotel had great breakfast and kids loved rocking on the swinging couches at the pool and in the garden. We only took the car out of the underground parking lot for a quick 45-minute drive to Lugano for Swiss Miniature and a better cable car ride than the one in Como.
reviews.title: Racing at the Regina
